'''1.20.15''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on August 16-18, 2023, which improves the game's stability.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/18588428772365-Minecraft-1-20-15-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.20.15 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 16, 2023}}</ref>

==Fixes== 
'''2 issues fixed'''
*Fixed a top crash that could occur during gameplay
*Fixed a bug related to some packs not being available to purchase successfully from the Marketplace
